info.title: QR Lookup Component
info.description: This component is responsible for looking up QR codes and returning the associated data. It temporarily includes the Item Data Authority Module

externalDocs.description: Documentation for Arda Cards Integration Developers

servers.description: Server for QR Lookup Component with version v1

get.summary: Get all the details of one item retrieved by its Id
get.description: Given an id for item, return the latest record previous to the given effective time

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request, the server will generate one if not provided

parameters.name: entity-id
parameters.description: The encoded reference of the item to retrieve

parameters.name: effectiveasof
parameters.description: The effective date of the item to retrieve

parameters.name: recordedasof
parameters.description: The recorded date of the item to retrieve

200.description: The Record matching the requested entity at the defined time

X-Request-ID.description: The Unique identifier for the corresponding request

put.summary: Update a item in the Data Authority
put.description:
Update an entity in the data authority given its id and an effective time.
It will fail if the effective time is earlier than the latest record of the entity

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request, the server will generate one if not provided

parameters.name: entity-id
parameters.description: The encoded reference of the item to retrieve

requestBody.description: Request to update an entity to its data authority

200.description: Success, returns the created record for the Item

X-Request-ID.description: The Unique identifier for the corresponding request

delete.summary: Delete a item in the Data Authority
delete.description:
Delete an entity in the data authority given its id and an effective time.
It will fail if the effective time is earlier than the latest record of the entity

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request, the server will generate one if not provided

parameters.name: entity-id
parameters.description: The encoded reference of the item to retrieve

parameters.name: effectiveasof
parameters.description: The effective date of the item to retrieve

200.description: Success, returns the deleted record for the Entity

X-Request-ID.description: The Unique identifier for the corresponding request

post.summary: Create a new item in the Data Authority
post.description: Create a new entity in the Data Authority

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request, the server will generate one if not provided

requestBody.description: Request to create a new entity in the Data Authority

200.description: Success, returns the created record for the entity

X-Request-ID.description: The Unique identifier for the corresponding request

post.summary: Query item entities in the Data Authority
post.description: Query item entities based on a Query object.

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request, the server will generate one if not provided

parameters.name: effectiveasof
parameters.description: The effective date of the item to retrieve

parameters.name: recordedasof
parameters.description: The recorded date of the item to retrieve

requestBody.description: Query object to filter item entities

200.description: Success, returns a page of item entities matching the query

X-Request-ID.description: The Unique identifier for the corresponding request

get.summary: Query item entities by page identifier in the Data Authority
get.description: Query item entities using a page identifier obtained from a previous query.

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request, the server will generate one if not provided

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page identifier for retrieving a specific page of item entities

parameters.name: effectiveasof
parameters.description: The effective date of the item to retrieve

parameters.name: recordedasof
parameters.description: The recorded date of the item to retrieve

200.description: Success, returns a page of item entities

X-Request-ID.description: The Unique identifier for the corresponding request

post.description: Query the history of a item entity instance

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request, the server will generate one if not provided

parameters.name: entity-id
parameters.description: The encoded reference of the item to retrieve

requestBody.description: Entity Id, Bitemporal boundaries and page of the history records to retrieve

200.description: Success, returns a page of item records matching the history request

X-Request-ID.description: The Unique identifier for the corresponding request

get.summary: Get a page of historical records for the given item entity instance
get.description: Return a page of historical records. The page identifier must be originated from the history-item

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request, the server will generate one if not provided

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page identifier for retrieving a specific page of item entities

parameters.name: effectiveasof
parameters.description: The effective date of the item to retrieve

parameters.name: recordedasof
parameters.description: The recorded date of the item to retrieve

200.description: Success, returns a page of item entities

X-Request-ID.description: The Unique identifier for the corresponding request
